name: (Dungeon Demo) Happy 30th Birthday Bro
description:
This was a birthday gift for my brother a few years ago. This was the precursor to my other demo, Explorer's Crypt. Thanks for checking it out.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Happy birthday TJ! I started making this game on January 20th and have kept you in mind while designing it. I wanted it to be infinitely replayable.

A lot of the stuff isn't finished but much of the foundation of the game has been laid. Here are the current features that are present in the game:

  • Randomized dungeon shapes with random designs in each room
  • Containers that you can loot
  • Inventory system + equipping / unequipping items
  • Enemies that are somewhat intelligent lol
  • Other stuff I don't even know I was half asleep while coding most of it lol

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Use left equipment
  • Right Mouse Button - Use right equipment / activate object in front of you (stairs, containers)
  • Mouse Wheel Scroll Up / Down - Search through inventory when you have more than 6 items
  • Escape - Pause menu

How To:

  • Progressing Through The Game - You need to survive the current floor of the dungeon while searching for the stairs that descend to the next floor of the dungeon.
  • Using or Equipping Items - Left or Right click in the inventory slots to equip an item to a specific key or to use it. Swords and weapons can be equipped while usable items like potions instantly uses them.
  • Unequipping Items - Click the equipped item that you want to unequip
